faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Agronet
faq.contactSupport: If you cannot find an answer to your question in our FAQ, you can always contact us. We will answer shortly!

what-is-agronet.question: What is Agronet?
what-is-agronet.answer: Agronet is a digital platform connecting farmers directly with buyers, eliminating middlemen and ensuring better prices for agricultural produce.

how-to-register.question: How do I register on Agronet?
how-to-register.answer: Simply register as a farmer or buyer, complete your profile, and start connecting with potential trading partners.

how-to-list.question: How do I list my products?
how-to-list.answer: After logging in, go to your dashboard and click on 'Add Product'. Fill in the details about your produce, including quantity, price, and quality parameters.

payment-process.question: How do I receive payments?
payment-process.answer: Payments are processed securely through our platform. You can link your bank account in your profile settings to receive direct payments when your produce is sold.

quality-assurance.question: How is quality assured?
quality-assurance.answer: We have a robust quality verification system. All products are checked against quality parameters, and we provide detailed quality reports. You can also check farmer ratings and reviews.

bulk-ordering.question: Can I place bulk orders?
bulk-ordering.answer: Yes, you can place bulk orders directly through the platform. Many farmers offer special prices for bulk purchases. You can negotiate prices for large quantities.

hero2.title: Success Stories
hero2.subtitle: Discover how Agronet is transforming the lives of farmers.
hero2.name: Rajesh Kumar
hero2.quote: Agronet has completely transformed my farming business. I now get 40% better prices for my produce and have direct relationships with buyers across the country.

successStories.name: Amit Patel
successStories.excerpt: Since joining Agronet, I've expanded my customer base across three states and increased my income significantly.

successStories.name: Priya Singh
successStories.excerpt: The organic certification support and direct market access through Agronet helped me command premium prices for my produce.

successStories.name: Mohammed Khan
successStories.excerpt: Agronet's logistics support and quality assurance system has helped me reach premium buyers in metro cities.

successStories.name: Lakshmi Devi
successStories.excerpt: The training and support from Agronet helped me adopt modern farming techniques and improve my yield.

successStories.name: Gurpreet Singh
successStories.excerpt: Direct buyer connections through Agronet helped me get better prices and timely payments for my wheat.

successStories.name: Meena Kumari
successStories.excerpt: Agronet's platform helped me showcase my organic produce to quality-conscious buyers across India.
